title: Atmosify
description: Atmosify is a versatile weather app that provides the user with accurate weather information, games and more.

title: Nexarda Bot
description: Nexarda Bot is a Discord bot that provides users with information about games, such as their price, rating, and more. (Made for discord)

title: Chronomagica
description: Chronomagica is a minecraft magic mod that allows for time manipulation, spell casting, and more.
